code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const fetchTodos=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/api/todos/"));setTodos(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchTodos();},[]);const addTodo=async()=>{try{const newTodo={title,completed:false};const response=await axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/api/todos/"),newTodo);setTodos([...todos,response.data]);setTitle('');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding todo:',error);}};const deleteTodo=async id=>{try{await axios.delete("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/api/todos/").concat(id,"/"));setTodos(todos.filter(todo=>todo.id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting todo:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My ToDo List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter new task",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addTodo,children:"Add Item"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"todo-list",children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"todo-item",children:[todo.title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>deleteTodo(todo.id),children:"x"})]},todo.id))})]});};export default App;
